document.name: File name
document.not_available: Preview is available for some formats only.
document.named_entities_not_searched:
Document not analyzed.

To search named entities, go to @:menu.analyse and start a new task "@:indexing.find_named_entities".
document.tiff_limitations: The browser preview of this TIFF file may not show all the images. We suggest you download it in your computer to view all the contents.
document.highlights_caution: Warning! the named entities will be highlighted and may replace text underneath. This does not impact your search results.
document.error_not_found: Your file was indexed in Datashare but the original is no longer in your Datashare folder on your computer. Preview is thus not available.
document.tags_visibility: These tags are visible for all users. Tags should be separated by space.
document.details_info: These information are extracted from the document's metadata.
document.author: Author
document.tag_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this tag?

indexing.title: Analyze your documents
indexing.description: Please read the documentation about adding documents.
indexing.extract_with_ocr_label: Do you want to extract text also from images and PDFs?
indexing.extract_with_ocr_help: If yes, Datashare will run OCR (Optical Character Recognition). It can take up to 10 times longer.
indexing.extract_only_new_label: Do you want to skip already indexed files?
indexing.extract_only_new_help: If yes, Datashare will only extract text from files that are not yet searchable in Datashare.
indexing.find_named_entities: Find people, organizations, locations and email addresses
indexing.find_named_entities_header: Which technology do you want to apply in order to find people, organizations and locations?
indexing.find_named_entities_subheader: Datashare uses Natural Language Processing models. Please choose one of them:
indexing.find_named_entities_tooltip: Texts must be extracted before finding named entities
indexing.default: By default - Offers the highest probability of working in most documents
indexing.sync_models: Please check this box if you are currently working offline with no internet connection.
indexing.delete_index_label: Remove all your documents from Datashare
indexing.delete_index_description: To be 100% safe, please remove your documents from the Datashare folder on your computer – don't forget to empty your trash bin of all Datashare documents! Make sure you have a copy of them in another secure place beforehand.

footer.homedir: Move files to this directory in order to analyze them

login.authentication_platform: To log in, use ICIJ secure authentication platform:
login.support_desk: If you need any help, please visit our support desk:

userHistory.heading: Your history
userHistory.description: The last 500 documents you opened with Datashare from this computer.

batchSearch.lead: Search multiple terms and documents at once.
batchSearch.title: Batch searches
batchSearch.heading: New batch search
batchSearch.fileDescription: Export your spreadsheet as a CSV. Only CSV format accepted. The first and only column should contain the terms to search. You can use operators (AND NOT * ? ! + - etc). Use 'space' instead of OR or | | with 'do phrase matches'. You can use Regex only between 2 slashes.
batchSearch.success: Your batch search is now running.
batchSearch.failure: Something went wrong, unable to start your batch search.
batchSearch.name: Name
batchSearch.fuzzinessDescription: Maximum number of operations (insertions, deletions, substitutions and transpositions) on characters needed to make one term match the other.
batchSearch.proximitySearchesDescription: Maximum number of operations (insertions, deletions, substitutions and transpositions) on terms needed to make one phrase match the other.
batchSearch.deleted: The batch search have been deleted.
batchSearch.notDeleted: The batch search have not been deleted.
batchSearch.publishedDescription: Give other members of the project access to this batch search. You can change this later.
batchSearch.phraseMatchDescription: Allows you to search for documents containing an exact sentence or phrase rather than comparing a set of keywords in random order.
batchSearch.phraseMatchDescriptionOperators: Do not insert operators in your queries
batchSearch.author: Author

batchSearchResults.errorMessage: The system encountered a problem. It can be a syntax error that you made in your CSV or another error. Please refer to this Help page where most common errors are described.

shortkeys.title: Search shortcuts
shortkeys.backToSearchResults: Go back to the search results
shortkeys.findPreviousOccurrence: Find the previous occurrence in the document
shortkeys.findPreviousOccurrenceAlt: Find the previous occurrence in the document
shortkeys.findNextOccurrence: Find the next occurrence in the document
shortkeys.findNextOccurrenceAlt: Find the next occurrence in the document

config.title: Configuration
config.submitSuccess: Modifications submitted. You should now restart Datashare.
